verses.text: In the mean time, when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people, insomuch that they trode one upon another, he began to say unto his disciples first of all, \+w Beware|strong="G4337"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the leaven|strong="G2219"\+w* \+w of the Pharisees|strong="G5330"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w hypocrisy|strong="G5272"\+w*.
